siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.excerpt: When Trafikito receives outputs of commands executed on your server it checks how many space the output takes. If the total size of all data is over your planâ€¦
markdownRemark.html:
When Trafikito receives outputs of commands executed on your server it checks how many space the output takes. If the total size of all data is over your plan limit, Trafikito will replace the longest output with messages about it.

When you are reaching any limit of the current plan, Trafikito will notify the workspace owner with an email message.

frontmatter.title: What happens if an output is more than your plan limit?
